item.title: Mesos cluster with Marathon running Docker
item.description:
Hi

So for hosting docker in large scale i have tested mesos cluster. Â Here is a guide for setting up 3 nodes in mesos running Centos 7. And the adding Marathon to controll the dockers running.

The network

mesos-master 172.0.0.10
mesos-slave1 172.0.0.11
mesos-slave2 172.0.0.12

 

The node also have on nic connect to the network with internet access.

 

Security

For this guide stop iptables and turn selinux off
